code: import{use}from'express/lib/router';import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddNote(_ref){let{onAdd}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[content,setContent]=useState('');const[backgroundColor,setBackgroundColor]=useState('#ffffff');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onAdd({title,content,backgroundColor});setTitle('');setContent('');setBackgroundColor('#ffffff');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"mb-3",style:{backgroundColor:backgroundColor},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"form-control",placeholder:"Content",value:content,onChange:e=>setContent(e.target.value),required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"colorPicker",className:"form-label",children:"Background Color"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"color",className:"form-control form-control-color",id:"colorPicker",value:backgroundColor,onChange:e=>setBackgroundColor(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Add Note"})]});}export default AddNote;
